did.abstract: Collection comprises a volume (179 pages) containing minutes of meetings of the board of directors (1908-1914), along with original minutes for meetings of the board of directors and annual stockholders' meetings, 1911-1914.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Spaulding & Merrick was a wholesale tobacco company formed by Samuel Gray Spaulding and Levi Merrick in 1865. The company was eventually merged with the American Tobacco Company in 1904.

acqinfo.p: The Spaulding & Merrick records were received by the David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library as a gift in 2015.
